# Deniko - Smart assistant designed for teachers and students

Deniko is a comprehensive platform designed to streamline educational processes for both teachers and students.

## Core Routes
- **Homepage**: https://deniko.net/
- **Login**: https://deniko.net/login
- **Register**: https://deniko.net/register
- **Dashboard**: https://deniko.net/dashboard

## Key Features
- **Schedule Management**: Organize classes and appointments efficiently.
- **Student Tracking**: Monitor student performance and attendance.
- **Performance Analytics**: Detailed insights and charts for educational metrics.
- **Role-Based Access**: Tailored interfaces for Teachers and Students.
- **Multi-language Support**: Available in English and Turkish.
